translation.en: Oh, well, I'll just have to eat all those pancakes myself then.
Oh, okay. Here, put that on.

translation.ko: 토비, 너희 아빠, 데니즈 전부 올 거야

translation.en: Yeah, I miss him too, Bunny.
And the blue one I like the most,
'cause he can camouflage in the water, and he has a beanbag to himself.
translation.ko: 물에서 위장할 수 있고 빈백도 갖고 있거든

translation.en: And has only a cushion and a beanbag.
[woman] Okay, I'm just gonna place the probe.
That, Jordie, is a little heartbeat.
[woman] No. You better not be doing what I think you're doing.
translation.ko: 너 설마 창문에 낙서하는 건 아니지?

translation.en: To my party, is Joan coming?
Uh, what makes you think that Joan might be there?
Isn't it a bit hard to miss somebody if you've never met them?
translation.ko: 본 적 없는 사람이 그리울 수 있나?

translation.en: I miss people I've never met all the time.
translation.ko: 난 항상 본 적 없는 사람들이 그리워

translation.en: You're so cute. I love you.
Uh, it's probably just escaped from someone's backyard.
translation.ko: 다른 집 토끼가 나온 건가 봐

translation.en: But she was sitting here, waiting for me.

translation.ko: - 생일 축하해, 우리 딸 - 어서 와 안녕, 아빠!

translation.en: -Ah, it's pouring a gale out there. -[woman] Come in, come in.
I just picked him up from his dad's. He didn't want to leave.
translation.ko: 애 아빠 집에서 데려왔더니 싫다고 그러네

translation.en: Um, she's coming straight from work. She'll be here soon.
translation.ko: 직장에서 바로 온대 금방 올 거야

translation.en: [woman] I'm gonna have to put posters up.
Or you could let her keep it.
Well, I saw all the boxes.
-When I went to check on the kids. -Hmm.
I hope you'll tell me if you're ever… not good.
Maybe we should just cut the cake.
I'm so sorry. She's-- She's two minutes away. I'm so sorry. I'm really, really sorry about this.
How are you guys? How's Denise?
We… are trying for a baby.
I thought Mia was gonna be an only child,
Well, apart from dinner, nothing. Just--
-Hey. -Pete was just telling me the good news.
It'll be more work, but the pay is fantastic.
-And, frankly, I was done-- -Oh, no, no. That--
That you guys are trying for a baby.
Mia? It's okay. I'm coming, honey.
Sweetheart, let's see. Here, let me see.
He's only three, Mia. He doesn't understand.
Is that a birthday cake I saw in the kitchen?
Why don't we go and have some cake?
Mia, you have fur all over you.
-Can you take this off, please? -[Mia] Don't!
[man on voicemail] This is Sandy McLennan from Warrendi Nursing Home.
Dr. Gregory, we'd like to meet with you to discuss your mother Joan's condition.
translation.ko: 어머님 상태에 대해 대화 나누고 싶은데요

translation.en: Can you please get in touch to arrange a time? Thank you.
translation.ko: 언제 시간 되시는지 연락 주실래요? 감사합니다

translation.en: -Um, what-- Uh, where is she? -She went out to play. She's with Nowa.
You know, you can always tell me if there's someone bullying you, Mia.
translation.ko: 누가 널 괴롭히면 엄마한테 말해, 미아

translation.en: Why won't you tell me why you were so upset today, Bunny?
translation.ko: 오늘 왜 화났는지 안 말해줄 거야, 우리 토끼?

translation.en: Mia. I'm your mummy. You know that.
All right, Mia. Hop out. Gotta get ready for bed.
translation.ko: 미아, 그만 나와, 잘 준비 해야지

translation.en: Um, can you take that off, please?
[Mia] So we have to put the trunk in the family tree about here.
translation.ko: 여기에 가계도 나무의 몸통을 그려야 해

translation.en: [Mia] And all the people are the leaves.
And we went to the funeral.
Uh, she lives very far away.
We need to stick photos in too. How far away?
Well, I'm gonna need them back.
-I don't have any photos of her. -Why not?
I haven't seen her in a long time.
I don't stay in touch with her.
Well, that's just the way it is, Bunny.
But I need a photo of Joan.
[gasps] Maybe Grandpa had some in his boxes.
-What are you doing out of bed? -It's mine. I've been looking for it.
translation.ko: - 안 자고 왜 왔어? - 내 거야, 내가 찾던 거야

translation.en: No, it's not. Go back to sleep.
-[Mia] It was dark and I couldn't wake up. -I know, Bunny.
translation.ko: - 어두웠고 일어날 수가 없었어 - 그랬구나, 우리 토끼

translation.en: It was just a bad dream.
Did you take this to bed with you?
Uh, I don't want you taking things that aren't yours.
translation.ko: 남의 물건을 함부로 가져가면 안 돼

translation.en: But it is mine. It's me.
[Mia] How do you know it's not me?
Because it was taken before you were born.
All right. All right, good night--
Sweetheart, you-- Did you hurt yourself?
Did someone at school do this to you?
Is-- Mia, is someone hurting you?
Well, maybe if she sees me, she'll feel better.
-No, I don't think so, Bunny. -I want to see Joan.
translation.ko: - 아닐 것 같아, 토끼야 - 조앤 보고 싶어

translation.en: [muffled] I want to see Joan! I want to see Joan!
I want to see Joan! I want to see Joan!
Shit. Shit. Oh, my God. Shit.
[Mia] I didn't see you hit anything.
-Why do you need to look for it? -Because it might be injured.
Uh, you sure you didn't see anything?
Jesus, what? How'd that happen? Here.
[Sandy] I appreciate you coming here. Your mother talks about you.
translation.ko: 와주셔서 고마워요 어머님이 따님 얘길 하셨어요

translation.en: [Sarah] You said we needed to discuss her condition.
Now, Sarah, I understand that your father hoped temporary care here
What Dad did for Joan was his business.
Oh, I understand that, and I'm sorry for your loss.
Your dad was a kind man.
I'm afraid it's my responsibility to tell you
that Joan will require ongoing care.
Uh, I'm sorry. Is this about increased fees?
Uh, there are additional costs but--
Uh, you… You have my email.
I didn't need to come in for this. Sorry.
I know that you may have phoned Dad all the time,
but I've been explicit about limiting necessary contact.
translation.ko: 전 웬만하면 연락을 삼가 달라고 했을 텐데요

translation.en: I didn't even know he'd put her here until he was dying.
translation.ko: 아빠가 돌아가실 때까지 여기 모실 줄 몰랐어요

translation.en: But, Sarah, this is not simply a matter of administration.
translation.ko: 하지만 이건 단순한 비용 문제가 아니에요

translation.en: Your mother has been diagnosed with dementia.
She's been forgetting to wash herself.
She keeps asking for you in moments of lucidity.
-[Sandy] You excited to meet your grandma? -Yeah.
[Sandy] She's had a bit of a rough morning.
Joan, this is Mia, Sarah's daughter.
I'm here now. Don't be sad.
[crying] Oh, I've missed you so much. So much.
Where have you been? Where have you been?
-You belong to me. -[Sandy] Joan, calm down. Please, Joan.
-Let's leave. -[Mia] No, I don't want to!
-[Joan] Don't leave me! -I don't want to go!
translation.ko: - 날 두고 가지 마! - 가기 싫어!

translation.en: -Stop, Mia. We're going. -I don't want to go!
-I want to play with Joan. -Let go, please.

translation.ko: - 진정해요 - 미아, 가야 해 - 당장! - 앨리스!

translation.en: No! I don't want to go!
-Stop! Stop! -Mia, just let me put your seatbelt on.
-Mia, put your legs inside. -I want to stay with Joan! -Put your legs in-- -I want to stay with Joan!
translation.ko: - 미아, 다리 넣어 - 조앤이랑 같이 있을래!

translation.en: -Stop kicking me. -No! I want to stay with--
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Please, baby. Bunny, let me see. I'm so sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry, sweetheart.
translation.ko: 좀 보여줘, 우리 토끼 엄마가 정말 미안해

translation.en: I know that you might not understand why Mummy is…
translation.ko: 엄마가 왜 그러는지 이해가 안 되겠지만…

translation.en: Wait. I wanna have a conv--
I said it looks like you've both been in the wars.
translation.ko: 둘 다 전쟁이라도 치른 것 같네요

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, you know, hard,
given the circumstances, but we're doing okay.
And do you think Mia's coping with the loss of her grandfather?
translation.ko: 할아버지가 돌아가신 걸 이겨내려고 그런 걸까요?

translation.en: Sarah, the school is here to support.
It's clear there's something troubling Mia. That's all.
Right, well, I-- [sputters] Yes, I did wonder whether she's being bullied.
I think it's something quite different than that.
I've been finding these on the back of her homework.
translation.ko: 이런 그림을 여러 개 숙제 뒤에 그렸더라고요

translation.en: Sarah, I think that Mia is struggling to control her anxiety.
Most kids experience anxiety at some time or another.
You know, things change. The loss of a loved one is difficult.
translation.ko: 상황 변화에 따라서요 사랑하는 사람을 잃으면 힘들죠

translation.en: But I think that Mia may need some extra help.
translation.ko: 제 생각엔 미아가 도움을 받아보면 좋겠어요

translation.en: Do you have a good family GP?
Oh, do you mean… professional help?
Sweetheart, do you wanna-- Do you wanna talk about what's been happening lately?
translation.ko: 아가, 요새 왜 그러는지 엄마랑 얘기할래?

translation.en: [Mia] I don't think I am myself.
What does-- What does that mean, Mia?
I want you to call me Alice.
-Bunny, you can't draw in library books. -I didn't.
translation.ko: - 도서관 책에 낙서하면 안 돼 - 안 했어

translation.en: Mia, you're not gonna get in trouble if you just tell the truth.
Well, you are, because you've drawn in a library book.
I don't understand what's going on with you lately, Mia.
Why do you need to see Joan?
You never even met her till yesterday.
She says she loves me and I belong to her.
You don't belong to her. You… [inhales sharply] You don't even know her.
translation.ko: 네가 왜 할머니 거야? 잘 알지도 못하면서

translation.en: She's sick, Bunny. She doesn't know who you are.
She doesn't know who I am. She doesn't know who anyone is.
translation.ko: 내가 누군지도 모르고 아무도 못 알아봐

translation.en: She does know who I am.
-I'm going to see her. -No, you're not.
Bunny, you are going to sleep.
[Mia whispering] You're not my real mummy.
Uh, no. Uh, no, he's not.
Okay, um, could you just let him know that I called?
Just need to run a few things past him.
I mean, I'm… I'm always here, if you need to talk.
Hey, I'm sorry about what happened with Toby.
I-- I completely understand why you lost your temper.
It's been really hard for you with your father's passing and…
Pete mentioned it might have brought up all that stuff from before
translation.ko: 과거에 있던 여동생 일이 생각났을 거라고

translation.en: I can't imagine what it must have been like.
You're a good… You're a good girl.
-[Pete over phone] Sarah. -[Sarah] What the fuck did you tell her?
[Pete sighs] I thought it was important that she know.
She understands, you know, trauma, family stuff.
She understands nothing. She doesn't need to understand anything.
-It has nothing to do with her. -Okay. Okay.
Because the school called me, and they said they've spoken to you too.
She-- [sighs] She wanted-- She wanted to see Joan again.
-No. Pete, it's-- -Sarah, it'll be all right.
Take Mia, show her the house, clear it out, and pack it up.
translation.ko: 미아랑 집으로 가서 정리하고 짐 싸서 나와

translation.en: -Put a fucking lid on it. -No, Pete--
Sarah, let Mia have a relationship with her grandma.
-Come back from where? -From where they go when they die.
Grandpa said he would come back as a pelican.
It was our little secret. He said he wanted to keep an eye on you.
translation.ko: 우리만의 비밀이야 펠리컨이 돼서 엄마 지켜볼 거래

translation.en: No, this is where I lived when I was little.
translation.ko: 여긴 엄마가 어릴 때 살았던 곳이야

translation.en: [Mia] Hey, I'm gonna sleep in here.
No, it's not. Come on, I don't wanna be in here.
translation.ko: 아니야, 이리 나와 여기 있기 싫어

translation.en: Uh-- Because I don't! Come on.
But I like it in here.
Come on, out. Get out. I don't want to--
translation.ko: 나오라고 했잖아 왜 말을 안 듣고…

translation.en: -No. -I don't want to be in here. Get out.
Can you draw me one after?
Before Grandpa and I moved to the city.
I don't like to talk about it.
I said I don't want to talk about it, Mia.
Mia, I need you to tell me if someone has said something to you.
translation.ko: 누가 너한테 뭐라고 했으면 엄마한테 얘기해

translation.en: Denise… maybe? Or-- or your dad?
If someone has said something to you about Alice.
translation.ko: 누가 앨리스 얘기를 해줬을 거 아냐

translation.en: Please. [shudders] Mia, this isn't a game.
Tell me if someone has said something to you that they shouldn't have.
translation.ko: 하지 말아야 할 말을 누가 했으면 알려줘

translation.en: -It is not fun-- -[loudly] I'm Alice! I'm Alice! I'm Alice!
Mia, look, I know you don't understand, but it really hurts Mummy…
translation.ko: 이해 못 하는 건 알겠지만 그러면 엄마 속상…

translation.en: [Sandy] Looking forward to seeing your grandma?

translation.ko: - 할머니 만나는 거 기대돼? - 네 좋아, 바로 앞의 오른쪽 문이야

translation.en: -Mia. Mia. -I'll be here if you need me.
Oh, we were here before, and you didn't recognize me.
translation.ko: 우리 전에도 왔었는데 날 못 알아봤어

translation.en: I've been wanting to meet you for such a very, very long time.
Albert told me all about you, little Mia.
translation.ko: 앨버트가 너에 대해 다 말해줬어, 우리 미아

translation.en: -[Sarah] Uh, Mia. -[Mia] You called me Alice.
-My name is Alice. You said-- -We're gonna go. Come on.
translation.ko: - 난 앨리스야, 그렇게… - 가자, 이리 와

translation.en: -Why don't you remember me? -[Sarah] Mia, come on.
translation.ko: - 왜 기억 못 해? - 미아, 가자

translation.en: [Mia] Can you tell me about her?
She had, uh… dark hair and freckles.
She'd, um… She'd find animals and bring them home and look after them.
No. Dogs. And… found a bird once.
translation.ko: 아니, 개였어 새를 데려온 적도 있었고

translation.en: My dad used to catch wild rabbits.
I used to help him check the traps, but she didn't like that.
translation.ko: 난 아빠를 도와 덫을 확인했는데 앨리스는 싫어했어

translation.en: I don't like hide-and-seek. You don't look for me.
translation.ko: 난 숨바꼭질 싫어해 날 찾으러 안 오잖아

translation.en: You make me hide and hide and hide.
You don't want to find me. You lock me in.
[voicemail] You've called Pete. I can't take your call at the moment. So leave a message.
translation.ko: 피트입니다, 지금은 전화를 받을 수 없으니 메시지 남겨주세요

translation.en: I don't know if you or Denise had said something to Mia,
translation.ko: 당신이나 데니즈가 미아에게 무슨 말 했어?

translation.en: And for whatever fucking reason, she's pretending to be her.
So if you could call me back, um…
I don't… I don't feel good, Pete.
I want to sell the house.
I'll pay for this place, this facility. You can stay here.
translation.ko: 요양원 비용은 내가 댈 테니 여기서 지내면 돼

translation.en: -I don't need-- -Dad asked me to before he died.
you still spoke, but I didn't know-- I didn't know all this.
Oh. [sighs] You don't need to sell the house.
I'm gonna go back there when I leave here.
translation.ko: 여기서 나가면 그 집으로 갈 거야

translation.en: It's what your father and I agreed.
What do you think's gonna happen? She'll stroll through the door one day?
translation.ko: 뭘 기대했어? 어느 날 돌아오기라도 할까 봐?

translation.en: You've wasted your life waiting for her.
I don't want to look at you. I can't stand the sight of you.
translation.ko: 아주 꼴도 보기 싫어 쳐다만 봐도 짜증 나

translation.en: I should never have left her with you. -She's not safe with you. -Ow!
translation.ko: 너랑 두고 가는 게 아니었어 너랑은 위험한데

translation.en: You never, ever do that again.
-Do you hear me? -I woke up and you weren't there.
I don't care. What if something had happened to you?
And did you-- Did you put the pictures back up?
-Did you go into the shed? -I didn't do anything.
Joan is not gonna come back here.
-So we need to pack everything up. -No!
translation.ko: - 짐을 다 싸야 해 - 안 돼!

translation.en: You need to pack your things. I am taking you home tomorrow.
translation.ko: 네 짐 챙겨 내일은 집에 갈 거야

translation.en: I'm gonna have a shower. Just stay inside.
translation.ko: 샤워하러 갈게 어디 나가지 말고 있어

translation.en: Mia, what's happening? Mia, it's okay. It's okay, sweetheart.
Stop, stop, stop, stop. You're having a nightmare.
-[Mia panting] -It's okay. You're having a nightmare.
Sweetheart, it's just a dream. It's okay. You're all right.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 그냥 꿈을 꾼 거야 괜찮아, 아무렇지도 않아

translation.en: What's this? What's this? No, no.
-[Mia, loudly] What? -Let me see. Let me see.
-What? -Just let me see. I just need to--

translation.ko: - 직접 그런 거야? - 뭔데? 하지 마

translation.en: -Just hold still. I need to get in here. -Stop it.
-I need to see what you've done-- -Stop it!
-No. Mia, I need to-- -Stop. Please, Mummy.
translation.ko: - 안 돼, 미아, 보여줘 - 그만해, 엄마

translation.en: [crying] Please, let me in, Alice! Please, let me in, Alice!
Jesus, Sarah. Why haven't you been answering your phone?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 세라! 왜 전화 안 받았어?

translation.en: [nurse] Sorry, you're not allowed to be in here.
For the things I did to you.
I told Mum you ran away.
Because I didn't wanna tell her the truth.
